projectsHeading: Convince yourself and read the Case Studies.
projectsDescription: A few parts are highly technical. Contact me if you want more info about a project.

finsights.name: Finsights
finsights.description: A Newsletter as a Service solution for all kinds of investors to keep in touch with their investments. Users can choose when, and about what they are notified about. They will then receive automatic performance updates for all selected stocks within the chosen time period.

decadruck.name: DecaDruck
decadruck.description: DecaDruck aims to open 3d printing to people without technical knowledge and industry expertise by combining consultation, design and realization into one service. If vistors already have a 3D-file, they can calculate the printing cost, with volume discount included.

personal-website.name: Personal Website
personal-website.description: A complete revision of my personal website. I switched from Flask to Django and now use TailwindCSS. Additionally, the website is available in German and English.

django-framework.name: Custom Framework for Django
django-framework.description: My personal Django Framework I will use to build new websites faster and more effectively. I include the fundamentals to build an Api and optimized the folder structure.

thetraderscircle.name: TheTradersCircle
thetraderscircle.description: My client wanted to build an online community to teach others trading. I built a compelling logo and made a brand framework, and also helped a little with the overall business strategy.

instadata.name: Instadata
instadata.description: A large instagram scraper built with Django that uses an API to communicate between user and program. The Scraper can be scaled seaminglessly and uses proxies. I built it to gather data for further Data-Science projects, so I used the Nominatim Geolocator and Regex to extract and order as much data as possible.

mainservermodule.name: MainServerModule
mainservermodule.description: A collection of modules that can A) securely connect to multiple of my Flask project APIs and exchange data aswell as periodically update the API-Key using Fernet-encryption B) Populate my Flask Webapp Framework C) Generate a basic PDF invoice.
